step.cmd: In the Route Management page, perform one of the following tasks:

choices.choice: If you want to revise a released route, select Released.
If you want to revise an archived route, select Archived.

step.cmd: Select the route that you want to revise.

step.stepresult: The Revise Route window appears, displaying the route details. The name, description, production line, material, and BOM formulation are copied from the latest revision of the route. You cannot modify these details. You can add, modify, or remove an operation. You can also assign a different BOM item, equipment, property group, or document.
The Edit Route page appears. The operations, resources, BOM items, properties, and documents linked to the route are the same as that of the previous version of the route.

step.cmd: As needed, add, modify, or remove operations, or assign a different BOM item, property, or document.

taskbody.result: The route is revised and is in the draft state. The value in the REVISION box is incremented by 1. To access the revision history of the route, in the Released or Archived section, select in the row containing the route.
